title: Cóndor Uno-Cero-Cinco
overview: A series inspired by real events that tells the story of "Operation Condor" and fictionally recounts one of the first claims to Argentine sovereignty over the Malvinas Islands. The operation carried out by some young Argentines who diverted an Aerolíneas Argentinas plane bound for Río Gallegos and made it land in the Malvinas Islands.
